text: Ndu zazera mba gumgi gu mbigir kurkurarim, mbe kha kameŋ ndɨkndɨgɨri. Ndu Fhe Bakɨme nɨman, ndu kama havharar mbe suaŋri, mbe mba bigi khɨni gum bigi bisarire ga suaŋv wari kaadogɨp, wari daaŋ thari. Mba khesharigi buni, nta guma then kurarga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mba buni mbararagi gumgi, nta guigira mben mpirmpirɨga tɨvir farfagi.
